name: @mealplanner/frontend
description: MealPlanner Frontend - Contains web, mobile, and shared packages

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd mealplanner-web && npm install && cd ../mealplanner-mobile && npm install && cd ../mealplanner-shared && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && cd mealplanner-web && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../mealplanner-mobile && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../mealplanner-shared && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.lint: cd mealplanner-web && npm run lint && cd ../mealplanner-mobile && npm run lint && cd ../mealplanner-shared && npm run lint
scripts.test: cd mealplanner-web && npm run test && cd ../mealplanner-mobile && npm run test && cd ../mealplanner-shared && npm run test
